name: Raif
title: Full Stack Developer
about: I’m Raif Karani, a passionate Full Stack Developer and AI/ML Enthusiast with expertise in web and mobile development, data science, and algorithmic problem-solving. Skilled in Java, Python, C, C++, React, Node.js, SQL, NoSQL, and MongoDB, I enjoy building scalable and user-focused applications.

I love combining artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data structures with modern frameworks to create innovative, data-driven solutions. My curiosity drives me to continuously learn new technologies and write clean, maintainable code that solves real-world challenges.

Beyond coding, I focus on creating products that balance performance, scalability, and great user experience. I’m always exploring cloud technologies, software architecture, and emerging tools to deliver impactful, future-ready solutions.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.desc: This project is a Doctor and Patient Management System streamlining patient records, appointments, and doctor access for improved healthcare efficiency.
projects.longDesc: This project is a Doctor and Patient Management System designed to streamline key operations within a healthcare setting. It focuses on efficiently managing patient information, appointments, and medical records, while also providing doctors with the tools to access patient histories, manage their schedules, and track treatments. The system aims to enhance communication, reduce manual paperwork, and improve the overall experience for both medical professionals and patients.
projects._comment: Project screenshot is optional and can be omitted if not available. Size should be 1280px x 450px.

projects.name: Blood Report Disease Diagnosis App
projects.desc: This is a machine learning web application that utilizes a trained Random Forest classifier to predict blood-related diseases based on blood report data.
projects.longDesc: This Blood Report Disease Diagnosis App is a machine learning web application that predicts blood-related diseases. It utilizes a trained Random Forest classifier to analyze blood report data, offering a preliminary diagnostic tool to aid in proactive healthcare.
projects._comment: Project screenshot is optional and can be omitted if not available. Size should be 1280px x 450px.

projects.name: MERN Stack Chat App With Socket.io
projects.desc: This is a MERN Stack chat application powered by Socket.io for real-time messaging, offering a dynamic and seamless user communication experience.
projects.longDesc: This is a real-time chat application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, Vite+React, Node.js), leveraging Socket.io for instant, bidirectional communication. It provides users with a seamless and dynamic messaging experience, showcasing a full-stack JavaScript development approach.
projects._comment: Project screenshot is optional and can be omitted if not available. Size should be 1280px x 450px.
